name: Grow a Tree
description:
Grow. Adapt. Endure. How tall can you become?

In Grow A Tree you're tasked with one thing. Growing a tree. Drought, heavy rain and fierce winds assault you. The weather is relentless. Grow leaves, roots and strengthen your trunk to survive. Will you grow the largest tree?

This is a prototype. It is rushed and unbalanced. Bugs and other funkiness may occur.

Enjoy!
